slider-slogan: Together, We Stand for Ukraine's Freedom!
slider-text-1: Kalina Foundation is more than a website – it's a mission to support Ukraine's heroes in their fight for freedom. Our platform enables people worldwide to join hands and provide the critical resources our defenders need to win the war as soon as possible.
slider-header-2: Every Donation Counts. Every Second Matters
slider-text-2: Together, we can bring victory closer. Your contributions don't just fund equipment; they deliver hope, security, and the promise of peace to millions of Ukrainians.
slider-text-3: The brave men and women of Ukraine rely on your generosity to secure vital equipment, including:
donate-items-1: Transport to mobilize troops and supplies;
donate-items-2: Drones & UAVs for unmatched reconnaissance and defense;
donate-items-3: Communication Devices to coordinate missions effectively;
donate-items-4: Optical Tools for precision and safety on the battlefield.
slider-text-4: Your support fuels Ukraine's strength. Choose from secure and convenient options to contribute:
donate-methods-1: PayPal – The simplest way to contribute globally;
donate-methods-2: PrivatBank – A trusted banking service for quick and reliable transfers;
donate-methods-3: MonoBank – one of Ukraine's most popular digital banking platform;
donate-methods-4: Crypto Wallets (via Metamask) – Make fast and secure donations.
slider-text-5: Join our global network of supporters and make a real difference. Together, we'll ensure a brighter, free future for Ukraine.
slider-text-link: Donate Now. Support the Heroes. Win the War.

tooltip2: The correct email address format consists of 4 parts: the local part, the '@' symbol, a period, and the domain name.
tooltip3: Your password must be at least 8 characters long and contain at least 1 letter, 1 number, and 1 special character (eg #, @, &)

tactical-bag-description: Made of durable nylon, featuring many pockets and modular attachments (MOLLE). Used for carrying ammo, food, first aid kits, drones, etc. Comfort and endurance are crucial in combat conditions.
generators-description: Provide autonomous power for equipment, charging drones, radios, laptops. Especially important at frontline positions without access to the power grid. Diesel or gasoline generators are often purchased.
military-form-description: Durable, comfortable boots protect feet from injuries. Quality uniforms shield from rain, cold, and heat. They ensure soldier’s comfort and health. The longer the uniform lasts, the fewer costs for the army.
fpv-drones-description: An FPV drone is a UAV controlled from the first-person view via goggles; it allows fast maneuvering and target detection — from infantry to armored vehicles.
mavic-description: Popular reconnaissance drones that let fighters observe enemy positions from above. Also used to adjust artillery fire. Most often Mavic 3 models are used, offering a good camera, flight range, and stable signal.
leleka-description: Leleka-100 (Eng. Leleka-100 or Ciconia) — a Ukrainian UAV designed for reconnaissance. Developed by the Ukrainian company DeViRo. Adopted by the Armed Forces of Ukraine in May 2021.
shark-d-description: SHARK — a reconnaissance UAV by Ukrspecsystems for surveillance and fire adjustment; equipped with AES-256 communication and capable of operating up to ~80 km behind enemy lines under electronic warfare conditions.
suvs-description: An SUV is an all-wheel-drive (4×4) vehicle with enhanced off-road capability, suitable for various road conditions and rough terrain; structurally different from regular cars.
boats-description: Boats are essential for crossing rivers, transporting personnel, and supplying positions in areas inaccessible by vehicles. Inflatable and motorized boats are most commonly used.
body-armor-description: Protects against rifle bullets, shell fragments, and mines. Essential for both recruits and experienced soldiers. It is important to buy certified vests with reliable plates.
thermal-imagers-description: Allow soldiers to see in complete darkness. Extremely important for reconnaissance, assaults, and patrols. Available as monoculars, binoculars, or helmet-mounted versions. A quality thermal device provides an edge in night combat.
radios-description: A portable radio station (walkie-talkie) is a device for wireless voice communication and coordination between users within signal range.
pd-1-description: PD-1 (People's Drone) — a Ukrainian UAV for aerial reconnaissance and tracking enemy movements. Developed by the All-Ukrainian Volunteer Center 'People’s Project' and Ukrspecsystems.
poseidon-description: H10 Poseidon — a reconnaissance UAV manufactured by Swarmly, equipped with dual cameras with 40× zoom, secure communication channels, and a vertical take-off and landing system.
ram-2-description: RAM II UAV — a Ukrainian loitering munition drone based on the 'Leleka-100' airframe (DEVIRO). Designed for precise strikes with minimized collateral damage in urban areas. Launched from a mobile catapult.
electronic-warfare-stations-description: Special devices that jam enemy signals: GPS, drone control, and other electronics. Crucial for protecting positions from enemy UAVs and FPV drones. Also reduce the effectiveness of enemy reconnaissance.
starlink-description: Starlink — a SpaceX project to create a satellite constellation for global broadband internet; first services launched in the USA and Canada (2020).
helmets-description: Protect the head from fragments, bullets, and impacts. Made of Kevlar or UHMWPE. Often feature mounts for night vision devices, cameras, or headsets. A reliable helmet can save a life during shelling.
join-community: Join our community of donators and make a difference today
unable-load-donators: Unable to load donators at the moment

hero-text1-5: Our global community enables people worldwide to join hands and provide the

hero-title2: Every Donation Counts. Every Second Matters
hero-text2-2: Together, we can bring victory closer. Your contributions don't just fund equipment — they deliver:
hero-text3-2: rely on your generosity to secure
hero-equipment-item4-text: — Precision and safety on the battlefield
hero-text4-2: to make your contribution count. Choose the method that works best for you:
hero-cta-text3: and make a real difference. Together, we'll ensure a brighter, free future for Ukraine.
hero-cta-subtitle1: Donate Now. Support the Heroes. Win the War.
hero-section-description: Kalina Fond is dedicated to providing vital aid, equipment, and protection for Ukraine's military. Together, we can bring victory closer and safeguard the future of our nation. Every contribution makes a difference.
donation-impact-hero-title: Empower Ukraine's Defenders: Your Donation Makes a Difference
donation-impact-hero-description: Every contribution directly equips Ukraine's military brigades with vital resources — from protective gear and medical aid to drones, vehicles, and field supplies. Your support helps ensure our soldiers can fight effectively and return safely.
donation-impact-choose-subtitle: Select an amount that aligns with your generosity, or enter a custom sum. Each donation directly translates into tangible support for those who need it most.
donation-impact-breakdown-subtitle: We allocate every contribution transparently and efficiently to meet the most urgent needs of Ukrainian brigades. Your donation goes directly toward strengthening our frontline heroes and ensuring they have what they need to protect our nation.
donation-impact-medical-description: Procurement of critical medical equipment and rehabilitation services
donation-impact-family-description: Assistance with housing, food, and education for veterans and their families
donation-impact-reintegration-descriptio: Vocational training, job placement, and psychological support for veterans
donation-impact-emergency-description: Immediate financial aid for urgent and unforeseen circumstances
donation-impact-total-donated-descriptio: Total amount we've raised to support our initiatives
donation-impact-transparency-note: Our financial reports are publicly available for full transparency.
donation-impact-testimonial-quote: We did not choose war. But we accepted the battle. And God himself is on our side. We have enough strength to defeat the enemy.
donation-impact-testimonial-author: — Valery Z., former commander-in-chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine
initiatives-subtitle: The Ukraine Military Support Fund is dedicated to strengthening and sustaining our frontline defenders. Every donation goes directly to support Ukraine's military brigades with essential resources they need to protect our nation.
initiatives-equipment-description: Supplying brigades with protective gear, uniforms, communication tools, and mission-critical equipment.
initiatives-medical-description: Providing first-aid kits, field medical supplies, and lifesaving resources for soldiers on the frontlines.
initiatives-transport-description: Supporting brigades with vehicles, fuel, and logistics to ensure mobility and operational efficiency.
initiatives-technology-description: Delivering advanced tools such as drones, night-vision systems, and tactical technology to enhance battlefield effectiveness.
initiatives-food-description: Ensuring brigades are equipped with food packages, water, and daily necessities during deployments.
initiatives-special-description: Channeling targeted donations into urgent needs identified by specific brigades, ensuring fast and direct impact.
stories-subtitle: Discover the strength and courage of Ukraine's frontline brigades. Each unit represents unwavering resilience, sacrifice, and the fight for freedom. Your support directly empowers them with the resources they need to defend our nation.
stories-brigade-3oshbr-description: One of Ukraine's most renowned assault brigades, known for its decisive operations on key frontlines. Supporting them means strengthening Ukraine's offensive capabilities.
stories-brigade-47ombr-description: A highly effective mechanized brigade, equipped with modern vehicles and technology, playing a vital role in armored assaults and counteroffensive operations.
stories-brigade-92oshbr-description: A legendary assault unit with deep roots in Ukraine's defense, continuously proving its resilience and tactical strength on the battlefield.
stories-brigade-azov-description: A symbol of unbreakable spirit, Azov brigade has become one of the most recognized units of Ukraine's National Guard, holding strong in critical battles.
stories-brigade-110ombr-description: A trusted mechanized brigade defending strategic directions and ensuring stability across the frontline.
stories-brigade-59ombr-description: Known for its courage and endurance, the 59th brigade provides essential defense and support across multiple sectors of Ukraine's armed forces.
stories-cta-title: Be a Part of Their Next Chapter
stories-cta-description: Every donation makes a difference — your support provides Ukraine's defenders on the frontline with the essential equipment, medical aid, and resources they need to stay strong and protect our nation.
team-mission-description-1: Founded in the wake of escalating conflict, the Ukraine Military Support Fund emerged from a deep commitment to stand with those defending their homeland. Our journey began with a simple belief: that no defender, and no family, should face hardship alone. We are dedicated to providing essential aid, rehabilitation, and support services to Ukrainian military veterans and their families. Our mission is to ensure their sacrifices are honored with comprehensive care and a pathway to renewed well-being.
team-mission-description-2: From humble beginnings, we have grown into a robust organization, powered by a global network of donors, volunteers, and partners. Every step of our history is marked by impactful stories of resilience and recovery, testament to the unwavering spirit of the Ukrainian people and the collective effort of our supporters.
team-vision-description: We envision a future where every Ukrainian veteran and their family thrives, empowered by comprehensive support that addresses their physical, psychological, and social needs. Our goal is to foster a community of strength, healing, and opportunity, ensuring that those who have served bravely can rebuild their lives with dignity and purpose. We strive for a Ukraine where the bravery of its defenders is matched by the unwavering support they receive from their nation and the world.
team-values-transparency-description: Upholding the highest standards of accountability in all operations and fund utilization.
team-values-integrity-description: Operating with honesty, ethical conduct, and respect for all beneficiaries and stakeholders.
team-values-compassion-description: Approaching every situation with empathy, understanding, and a deep commitment to care.
team-values-impact-description: Maximizing the effectiveness of every donation to create lasting positive change.
team-values-solidarity-description: Fostering a strong community of support, recognizing the shared responsibility to our heroes.
